title: Sanguine Blade
content:
Sanguine Blade Information

Scarlet Remittance: Gain a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, damage, and Spell Save DC for every foe you slay, up to a maximum of +3. Scarlet Regeneration: If you have a +3 bonus from Scarlet Remittance, consume it to regain 3d10 hitpoints. Range: 1.5m
